rules.description: Caps Lock to Hyper (Shift+Command+Option+Control) or Escape (If Alone), Esc => Esc (If Alone) else Insert

from.description: Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+,
Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+.

rules.description: Visual Studio Code
VS Code: Hyper + C > Copy Selected Text to 2nd Editor Group
Except VS Code: Quit Application Ctrl + Q => Cmd + Q, Cmd + Up/Down => Scroll Up/Down
PC-Style Alt + Left/Right => Home/End, Cmd + Left/Right => Go to Start/End of the Word, Cmd + Home/End => Go to Start/End of the File
Finder: Enter => Cmd + O (Open), Ctrl + E => Cmd + Alt + L (Downloads), Alt + Enter => Cmd + I, Shift + F10 => Right Click
Finder: Delete, Shift + Delete => Cmd + Delete, Cmd+ Alt + Delete
Cmd + Tab, Cmd + Shift + Tab => Ctrl + Tab, Ctrl + Shift + Tab
Cmd + Y => Cmd + Shift + Z (Redo)
Cmd+Shift+Esc => Open Activity Monitor
Ctrl + H => Cmd + H (Hide Front App)
Ctrl + V => Cmd + Option + H (Hide Others)
F11 => Toggle Full Screen
Ctrl + Hold Down Arrow => Minimize Window, Ctrl + M => Cmd + M (Minimize)
Ctrl + C => Toggle Caps Lock
Cmd + H => Cmd + Option + F (Replace)
Browser Cmd + H => Cmd + Y (History), Cmd + J => Cmd + Alt + L (Downloads), Cmd + K => Cmd + Alt + F (Search Google)
Ctrl + S => Open System Preferences, Cmd + Alt + T => Open Terminal
PrintScr => Screenshot to File (If Alone) and Long press to open Screenshot App
o Launcher
Ctrl + G => Search Selected in Google
Ctrl + O => Open Link in Browser
Ctrl + Y => Open YouTube
Ctrl + U => Udemy
Ctrl + F1 => Sleep, F2 => Monitor Off, F3 => Shut Down
Hyper + a/d/s/w => Scroll Desktop Left / Right / Mission Control / All Front App Windows
Caps Lock + h/; => Home/End, ijkl, u => PgUp, n => PgDn, ' => Delete
Enable Numlock Toggle
Numpad Keys
